headline: Assessing AT&T (T) After Recent Share Price Strength And Perceived Undervaluation
summary: Why AT&T (T) Is Back on Investors’ Radar AT&T (T) has attracted fresh attention after a recent stretch of share price gains, putting its valuation, income profile, and business mix back under the microscope for investors considering large telecom exposure. See our latest analysis for AT&T. That recent share price strength stands out, with a 13.01% 1 month share price return at a last close of US$27.11. The 1 year and 5 year total shareholder returns of 12.51% and 67.23% suggest momentum has...

headline: How T-Mobile's 2026 Wireless Subscriber Target Could Rock The Telecom Boat
summary: When T-Mobile reports Q4 earnings and hosts an investor day on Wednesday, rivals AT&T and Verizon will be focused on its 2026 guidance.

headline: AT&T drops first smartphone for key customers rivals don’t have
summary: AT&T, one of the top three U.S. phone carriers, is currently facing heightened competition and an uptick in customer losses. To help give it an edge over its rivals, the company has launched a first-of-its-kind smartphone, targeting a vital customer group. During the fourth quarter of ...

headline: AT&T Deepens Fiber And Cloud Role With Amazon Deals And Lumen Buy
summary: AT&T (NYSE:T) entered new partnerships with Amazon Web Services and Amazon Leo to modernize U.S. connectivity infrastructure. The collaboration focuses on combining AT&T's fiber network with cloud, AI, and satellite capabilities, including broadband reach into underserved areas. AT&T also closed its acquisition of Lumen's mass-market fiber business, adding millions of fiber locations to its network. For you as an investor, AT&T sits at the intersection of wireless, fiber broadband, and...

headline: American Tower Corporation (AMT) Faces Dish Wireless Lease Default, But Analysts Remain Cautiously Optimistic
summary: American Tower Corporation (NYSE:AMT) is one of Goldman Sachs’ top REIT stock picks. On January 28, in regulatory filings, American Tower Corporation (NYSE:AMT) reiterated that Dish Wireless has defaulted in lease payments. Consequently, the company is in default under the Strategic Collaboration Agreement entered into in 2021. American Tower Corporation insists that the default will […]
